    • addRemotePlayer

      public static void addRemotePlayer(String gameID, String username, GameActionStubImpl remotePlayer) throws RemoteException
      This method binds a new remote object for a player and adds this remote instance to the list of remote players of a game
      Parameters:
      gameID - id of the game to which we are adding a new remote player
      username - username of the player we are adding
      remotePlayer - remote player which we are adding
